Radical Queer PlayHouse

Radical Queer Playhouse is facilitated by the BigFatPervs every third Saturday of the month in NieuwLand

It is a space where people can come together to find community, share knowledge and experience and learn from each other. Where someone can facilitate or introduce a subject. Where we can hold space for each other and play and learn together. Sharing in knowledge and experience can have different formats but is always a space where we can all participate and explore. Where we are free to bring a subject/practice we are interested in and enjoy, without the need to be an expert on the matter.

If you would like to collaborate or contribute, please contact us.
